Author: sublimeAuxiliatrix
Text: That is SO relatable!!  I just don’t get why in earth it has to be a conversation topic?  Like, is it really anyone’s business?  Does it matter/affect you??

Author: pabstpumpkinbeer
Text: Ughhhh girl same same same. Why can't people just... not comment on what other people eat? It's really easy not to do it. Just talk about literally anything else?!?!  Every time we have dinner with my fiance's grandparents, his grandfather talks about how skinny my fiance and his brother are and asks them how much they weigh. Interestingly, I always end up very drunk after those dinners!
